member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used to match file that appear in the watch folder.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.RetransmissionStat
member.summary: Gets or sets the statistic that defines the number of buffer block retransmissions in the system.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.BlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of each block of data that is read from the file.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.WatchInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, between each scan of the watch folder.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.ProcessInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, between each publication of a block of data from the active file.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.RetransmissionThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of buffer blocks that can be retransmitted during a reporting interval before the begins throttling its buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.BlockSizeAdjustment
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of adjustment to be applied to the buffer size when throttling buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.ProcessIntervalAdjustment
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of adjustment to be applied to the process interval when throttling buffer blocks.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.AdjustedBlockSize
member.summary: Gets the block size after making adjustments for throttling.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.AdjustedProcessInterval
member.summary: Gets the process interval after making adjustments for throttling.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.InputMeasurementKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets primary keys of input measurements the expects, if any.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.FramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the frames per second to be used by the .
member.remarks: Overridden to hide base class attributes.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.LagTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed past time deviation tolerance, in seconds (can be sub-second).

remarks.para: Defines the time sensitivity to past measurement timestamps.
The number of seconds allowed before assuming a measurement timestamp is too old.
This becomes the amount of delay introduced by the concentrator to allow time for data to flow into the system.

member.exception: LagTime must be greater than zero, but it can be less than one.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.FileBlockReader.LeadTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed future time deviation tolerance, in seconds (can be sub-second).

remarks.para: Defines the time sensitivity to future measurement timestamps.
The number of seconds allowed before assuming a measurement timestamp is too advanced.
This becomes the tolerated +/- accuracy of the local clock to real-time.

member.exception: LeadTime must be greater than zero, but it can be less than one.

member.name: T:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher
member.summary: Represents an adapter that will launch a configured executable process.
member.remarks: Unless credentials are provided to create an authentication context, rights of any launched executable will be limited to those available to time-series host.

member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.summary: Gets or sets the path and filename of executable to launch as a new process.

member.summary: Gets or sets any command line arguments to use when launching the process.

member.summary: Gets or sets working directory to use when launching the process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.EnvironmentalVariables
member.summary: Gets or sets any needed environmental variables that should be set or updated before launching the process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.CreateNoWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if a new window should be created when launching the process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.WindowStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets window style to use when launching the process if creating a window.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.ErrorDialog
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if an error dialog should be displayed if the process cannot be launched.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.Domain
member.summary: Gets or sets the user domain to use when creating an authentication context before launching the process.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user name to use when creating an authentication context before launching the process.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user password to use when creating an authentication context before launching the process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.LoadUserProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if Windows user profile should be loaded from the registry before launching the process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.InitialInputFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets filename that contains text to use as standard input into process after it has been launched.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.InitialInputProcessingDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the processing delay, in milliseconds, before text defined in the is sent to the launched process.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.RedirectOutputToHostEnvironment
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if process standard output should be redirected to the hosting environment.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.RedirectErrorToHostEnvironment
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if process standard error output should be redirected to the hosting environment.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.ProcessOutputAsLogMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if redirected output should be attempted to be parsed as formatted log messages, e.g.: lvl=info msg="log message".

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.LogMessageTextExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets regular expression used to find log message text when redirected output is processed as formatted log messages.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.LogMessageLevelExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets regular expression used to find log message level when redirected output is processed as formatted log messages.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.LogMessageLevelMappings
member.summary: Gets or sets log level mappings to use when redirected output is processed as formatted log messages.

member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if launched process should be forcibly terminated when adapter is disposed.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.UtilizationUpdateInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval over which to calculate lunched process utilization.

member.name: P:FileAdapters.ProcessLauncher.TrackProcessStatistics
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if statistics should be tracked for launched process.
